title: Should Kristin Be Offended By What This Man Just Asked Her To Do?
description:
Something just went down off-air in the studio that has Kristin questioning one of our engineers. It started when he came into the studio and directly asked Kristin to clean off the table in the hallway.
At first, we thought nothing of the request. But then, we started to wonder... why did he ask the woman to clean the table and not the men?
